purge.desc: Removes a specified amount of messages from the chat.
purge.usage: purge <amount of messages to remove>. Keep in mind this happens instantly.

setusername.desc: Changes the username of the bot. Do not spam this command or discord servers will block future namechange.

help.desc: Shows this list of useful info.

ping.desc: Call ping command for an incredible response. (Mostly used for debugging / to check if bot is alive)

quote.desc: Finds a random, non-link message from the user specified and re-sends it as a quote back to the chat channel.

restart.desc: Restarts the bot. Useful for applying changes. When called, bot should respond with status if succeeded.

anonmsg.desc: Sends a DM to a specified user from this bot without any possible trace. They won't know its you unless you're an idiot.

status.desc: Changes the 'Playing' status underneath my name

audio.desc:
Joins the voice channel and plays an audio file. Useful for giggles and soundboard stuffs. 
 Might be useful to set an alias with this command for quicker access.

shortcut.desc: Create shortcut commands / aliases. E.g. you can do !audio tuturu.mp3 with !tuturu. This is useful for soundboard-like functionality or quick access to those critical sounds.

q.desc: Plays songs from YouTube. Accepts either links or search queries.

request.desc: A quicker version of queue. Immediately adds songs to current queue without a search options dialogue.

playlist.desc: Can be used to view playlist info or remove songs from playlist.

setsurprise.desc: Joins the voice channel every now and then to play some dank sounds.

skip.desc: skips the currently playing song. (Requires that audio is streaming to voice channel.)

attitude.desc: Pesters you about using wildbot. Shows some real attitude yo.

clean.desc: Cleans the chat of commands and other gunk.
